definition: to float/to drift/to wander/variant of 蜉蝣[fu2 you2]

sentences.english: Whales use their pectinate teeth to gather plankton.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼用牠们栉齿状的牙齿来捉浮游生物。

sentences.english: As shallow-water plants, phytoplankton are therefore starving to death, according to the findings.
sentences.chinese: 根据该研究，浮游植物为浅水植物，因而饿死。

sentences.english: So we know this plankton is very dange rous.
sentences.chinese: 可见浮游生物是非常很快死亡。

sentences.english: We are awe-struck by enormous mammals that float.
sentences.chinese: 我们也心存敬畏，浮游哺乳的巨大。

sentences.english: However, protozoan grazers feed well on phytoplankton in this size range.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在原食草植物吃浮游植物在这个大小范围。

sentences.english: He swam up past the boulders made of spongy gishy-gosh.
sentences.chinese: 他游游过一堆色彩斑斓，类似海绵的海洋浮游物。

sentences.english: The main forms of life in the limnetic zone are phytoplankton and zooplankton.
sentences.chinese: 此区主要由浮游植物和浮游动物组成。

sentences.english: The main forms of life in the limnetic zone are phytoplankton and zooplankton.
sentences.chinese: 此区主要由浮游植物和浮游动物组成。

sentences.english: Broad disks of iridescent brightness swam under his lids.
sentences.chinese: 闪亮的彩色光团在他的眼皮底下浮游。

sentences.english: Killing off phytoplankton would be like removing all grass from land.
sentences.chinese: 杀光浮游植物就和把陆地上的草全拔了一样。

sentences.english: The cholera bacteria Vibrio cholerae can live on some species of plankton.
sentences.chinese: 霍乱的病原体霍乱弧菌可以在一些浮游生物体内生存。

sentences.english: This investigation showed that Zhongshan City had abundant freshwater zooplankton species.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果表明，中山市淡水浮游动物资源比较丰富。

sentences.english: Many fish depend on this small life-form for food.
sentences.chinese: 许多鱼类以此种小的浮游生物为食物。

sentences.english: Unicellular planktonic groups form the basis of the food chain in the deep sea.
sentences.chinese: 单细胞浮游生物是形成深海食物链的基础。

sentences.english: Phytoplankton can grow explosively over a few days or weeks.
sentences.chinese: 浮游植物的数量可以在数天或数周内爆炸性增长。

sentences.english: Haptomonads are common in marine plankton and freshwater.
sentences.chinese: 定鞭藻类通常存在于海洋和淡水浮游生物中。

definition: to float/to hover/also written 漂浮
to float/to hover/to drift (also fig., to lead a wandering life)/to rove/showy/superficial
variant of 飄盪|飘荡[piao1 dang4]
to drift/to wave/to float on the waves/to flutter in the wind
to wander/to roam about/to loaf about/to be idle
